As mentioned, the first application done by Raquel stung my eye and were all clumped up and poked my waterline in my lids.i was very hesitant to come back by they insisted to fix it. This time they gave me Julie. I was really hoping its going to be pain free And IT WAS!!! Julie took care of me and she removed the eyelash that was clumped up and hurting my eye. And when she re applied the lashes, it didn't burn my eyes at all! I was not in pain and it was a smooth application just like how it was before when I had my lashes done. She did a wonderful job, took her time and made sure it looked good. We had a good conversation so I didn't even notice the time anymore. I was 15 minutes late because of the traffic and the rain but she still waited for me and took me in and made sure that I can still have a good experience in this place. Of course the important part is how my lashes would look like right? It was fantastic! I liked it a lot! I can say now that I can go back to this place and will make sure Julie will apply my lash extensions again! Thanks Julie!!

31.description: They always start on time and it's so relaxing I fall asleep.  The lashes make it easier for me to get ready in the morning because I have the option to apply makeup or not - winner!!

34.description: Such amazing staff and lashes!!! A must if in Chicago!! Such an adorable space and knowledgeable and friendly staff

16.description: AMAZING!!!! I have been going to Chicago Lashes since March and could not be happier i found them. The girls there are very knowledgable and take their time to help me decide what look I want before we get started. Ive gotten new sets every time because i wanted to experiment with different looks, and every single time has been better than the next. This was very important to me since i switch up my make-up routine quite often. Ive had everything from natural to full on dramatic and they never disappoint. I always leave thrilled with the end result. If you are looking for a place to get lashes this is it.

13.description: I'm not one to leave a review unless I had a great experience. Clicking around online I Found Chicago Lashes' website. Their site was so beautiful and inviting I just had to call and ask them my questions about eyelash extensions because I've never had them done before. They were so helpful and patient answering all my questions (I had several). I feel much more comfortable and excited about getting eyelash extensions now. Thanks for your all your help Chicago Lashes!

11.description: When making an appointment with Chicago Lashes, they take your credit card information in case you have to cancel the appointment in which case you will be charged a $50 cancellation fee. Considering a full set is $95, thats a rather high fee in my opinion. So be sure you can 100% commit to the appointment.The receptionist is nice and polite. Make sure if you're using the yelp special you get charged the right amount, because even after mentioning it I got charged the full amount. The money was not refunded but rather a $10 "credit" was applied to my account. (meaning i have to be a return customer, not a fan)...The technician, Kara, was very nice and applied the lashes properly and with precision. She does her job well, in what she was trained to do. But if you want a custom look this may not be the place for you. I normally get a custom look at another place and when I showed pictures and explained how, I still received the full lash they normally give. Not preferred but okay, I can deal with it. I have had the lashes in for about a week and only a few have fallen out, which only supports my statement above that Kara did her job well!  She explained how to take care of them and provided a little goodie bag that also included instructions.

39.description: I have been client of Chicago Lashes for more than a year, and I love how Felicia doing my eyelashes. Great style and look! I don't need to put make up on when I get them done, usually within 4 weeks. My stylist always checks on me to see if there are some problems within a week. Example: just happened last week that the eyelashes fell off few days after got them done. After have explained the problem to Felicia, she got them fix few days later with no charge.It's the only salon that does that. And I strongly believe that my stylist Felicia is the best and always knows what I need and want.

37.description: Camille is very talented, she does my lashes every time just like I wanted. I have many requests about curl, length or volume and she understands me perfectly. Also she is cute and nice! I have recommended her to many of my friends.

0.description: Faithful and happy customer! Love  my lashes! Camille as always does a fantastic job! The only other thing I could ask for is for them to open a location in Oak Brook, Naperville Area (I'm being selfish), or Aurora. Regardless where they are at, I am there. Camille is MY lash stylist but her Aunt Bambi is awesome and so is Jennifer San Juan! The place is friendly and they really do make sure you are happy! it is so worth my drive and $.Everyone thinks they are my lashes. People stare and Say you have such beautiful, long lashes, depending on my mood I'll either respond and say thank you (with a little flutter, of course) or thank you but they are not mine, I go to Chicago Lashes.

38.description: I'd have to say that I was not going to give this place a second chance but I really wanted my lashes fixed.  I went ahead and scheduled a second appointment with a different technician. Thank god I did!  I had the same experience that happened with Midas M.  I came in to get a full Kim k set with Bambi  for the first time.  First off your suppose to fill out paper work before the process but she said I could do it at end. Um yeah didn't know I was suppose to take off my contacts.  Than it took about 30 min which I was surprised that she finished so fast being it my first time. I'm pretty sure she rushed the process because she was leaving the salon right before I paid the front desk.  I told her that I wanted my lashes curled and darker so u can see them more from the front but no! My eyes looked the same in the front  before getting them done.  Yes they looked longer from the side but they where straight pointed out! Ew.? They looked more of the natural look than the Kim K look which I feel ripped off on. On top of that you can see multiple extensions glued to one real lash and some glued to my eyelid.  Within the first week so many of the fake lashes were hanging from the tip of my real lashes and I lost some lashes because of that.  Ugh! It was the worst 2 weeks ever!!  My second appointment I made with Felicia!  I told her what happened with my first appointment and what I wanted fixed.  And OMG she did EXACTLY what I asked for!!! The fill took about an hour and she made sure that every single lash was done correctly.  She saved me from going to a pricey place as a last resort.  I also don't mind the long commute. Thank you Felicia! I will be going to you from now on! =)

51.description: Lovely work. I moved the day after I visited this place (upon numerous recommendations) and dream of my lashes looking as lovely and lasting as long as they did! I have tried three places in my new city and none of them can match the quality or price! Go here. It's worth the Uber ride.

27.description: Had my lashes filled today by Michelle. .. she was so great. .took old ones off (not sure but think they were not done correctly) and she re applied for me! !  I know she spent extra time with me and they look amazing! ! Love my Chicago Lashes!

32.description: I wasn't impressed. The lashes looked cheap (too thick and clumpy). The lashologist used very dark colored lashes and bundles, rather than single lashes. I was annoyed because she changed what we discussed without telling me. The end result looked like something I could have gotten for $25 at a Korean nail shop. They also lasted about as long (two weeks). I would not waste the money here, there are better places for lashes around the City.

54.description: After extensive research on eyelash extensions I decided upon Chicago Lashes. I loved this place it was kind of small but the decor was super cute. I choose the Natural set and Bambi was my technician. She was great and very knowledgable! They came out exactly what I wanted! They looked super natural! I love them!!!

48.description: Brought my sister here this time for eyelash extensions because the women in our family have had issues with their eye brows (for some reason). I have to say the great work they did made a big difference in her appearance. While one of the girls worked on my mom, the guy at the front desk, James, made sure I was taken care if with amenities. He also gave me updates on my sister while I waited.This is the second time I have brought in a family member and have had a very pleasant experience. The price is right and the service they offer is well worth it. I wish I could give 10 stars.

44.description: This is a long overdue review.  I've been coming here for about a year and had the absolute pleasure of meeting Sashawn who is THE BOMB! The work this woman does is nothing short of spectacular.  I get constant compliments and I struggle with putting her name on here for no other reason that she's always booked and I selfishly need her to be available. However, her recognition and busy schedule are well deserved.  This place is a little far from me and I dread the northbound traffic. That said, its more than worth the commute. As the other review suggest, the salon is quaint and the snacks, coffee and tea is just and added bonus.  I've read a lot of the reviews and I'm glad to know that all of the ladies are professional and do a great job.  I'm loyal to great service and I don't ever plan to leave Ms. Sashawn the Bomb though.

24.description: My lashes are great if they were just a regular set of lashes but they could be fuller considering I requested a volume set. And I understood it takes a long time so I did not rush them or anything . However my extensionsist was skilled . She did them nice and neat. She was sweet . They were prompt and timely . Just a little disappointed they didn't turn out as full and curly as I hoped. I might give another shot to see if they get it fuller next time.

7.description: Hands down, the best place for eyelash extensions in the city. They have the best price and the greatest value. They even have a punch card so you get every 5th fill for free. The inside is a little gaudy and it's in a strange area, but don't let that deter you! They just opened up their second store in Skokie, so they're doing something right!

49.description: Got a call later on that day in regards to my canceled appointment. The gentleman on the phone apologized about the mix up and wanted to schedule me a consultation with the owner Jennifer. I agreed and went in today 6/11. I'm definitely glad I did!!! She was awesome and really nice!! I'm scheduled to go back in 6/24 to put my extensions in!!! Couldn't be more excited :D

40.description: I have been wanting to try lash extensions for awhile, so I was so happy when I found a deal through Chicago Lashes. $89 for Kim K lashes, that can't be beat! My appointment was last Monday and everything seemed great. The salon was adorable, my stylist was so nice and extremely professional, the location was good. More than anything, I was EXTREMELY impressed with how good they were at working with my busy schedule to find an appointment time. The appointment was quick and I left with beautiful full lashes that I loved. My stylist gave me pretty detailed instructions and told me to call if I had any problems within 3 days. I followed all the instructions and my lashes continued to be beautiful...for about 3 days. After that, they started falling out pretty rapidly.  Maybe that's normal, but it's only Sunday (so, less than a week) and there are already significant gaps, especially in the lashes on my left eye. It looks like I'm wearing horribly clumpy mascara, which looks very unprofessional and is pretty embarrassing. I really loved my lashes while they lasted, but I will not be returning. The money I paid, even with a discount, is just not worth a week of good lashes.

53.description: The place really is cute on the inside, but I think poor management and a lack of skilled staff is the biggest issue.  They advertised extensions but I actually ended up with flares which are 2-3lashes glued onto my existing lashes.  As a result my lashes ended up severely damaged and broken off.  If you have to end up here, ask for Jennifer the owner.  She seems to take care of the lash a little more than the other experts.   They are a little cheaper than area lash experts, and you get what you pay for.

30.description: I normally don't review but I thought this was weird. I went to get my lashes done December 24th, the salon was nice, I can't recall who my appointment was with but she was very kind and at the end of the day the lashes were gorgeous!!! I loved it, but....... I was extra careful with everything. Managed to not shower or get them wet for a little more than 48 hours. But I would see as the day went by lashes would be sticking up straight or straight up and crossing over so I would use my spoolie to brush them out and those lashes would fall out. I never touched my lashes, rubbed my eyes, got them wet or anything. Then also certain lashes could droop and I would touch the lash to move it and the glue would scratch my eye or fall out. It has only been 4 days and I have many bald spots in my lashes, it just isn't attractive... Has this happened to anyone else? I understand lashes she'd just like any other hair but I have probably lost 20 or 30+ false lashes.

46.description: Addendum:  Jennifer reached out to me and we discussed my experience. It turns out I'm not a good candidate for extensions due to my short and wimpy lashes. She was very polite and offered me a refund. She also suggested that I wait until my lashes get a little longer and come back in a couple of months for the extensions again. Thank you for your prompt reply and professionalism.

1.description: Update! Chicago Lashes offered me to come in and have my lashes fixed for free. What a difference a different technician makes! I went to Moon and she did a fabulous job! She explained the different types of lashes, different lengths and explained the styles to me before we started. It took the full two hours and she was very adamant about adding extensions to each lash to make them look as full as possible.My lashes are now very full and in the cat eye style! Next time I think I will get them a little longer in the middle to get a mix between the cat eye and rainbow styles. I like my eyes to still look full but to still have the wispy lashes on the ends. Will be coming back to get them refilled in a few weeks! Thank you to Chicago Lashes for keeping your customers happy :)

55.description: I've been coming here for about a year. I love the look and feel of eyelash extensions. I recommend Bambi. She is talented, sweet and very welcoming. She is deserving of 5 stars. However, I feel that lately, the customer service has been very poor. Especially the one gentleman who answers the phones at the front desk. I don't think he's made eye contact with me the last 5 or six visits. When he answers the phone he's not helpful at booking appointments, he makes me feel like he's rushing to get off the phone all the time. The tone of voice he uses is very snobby and not inviting at all. I don't even want to call or come in anymore. I am trying a new place on Delaware today and if they do a good job, then I don't plan to ever be back to Chicago Lashes.

9.description: I just moved from California and I was nervous about getting a lash fill in a new city. Honestly, I'm so impressed with this place! My lashes look way better than my stylist in CA ever did them. They are a little shorter than I was expecting, but look so natural and they feel more natural on my eyes. I will definitely be going back.

26.description: When making an appointment with Chicago Lashes, they take your credit card information in case you have to cancel the appointment in which case you will be charged a $50 cancellation fee. Considering a full set is $95, thats a rather high fee in my opinion. So be sure you can 100% commit to the appointment.The receptionist is nice and polite. Make sure if you're using the yelp special you get charged the right amount, because even after mentioning it I got charged the full amount. The money was not refunded but rather a $10 "credit" was applied to my account. (meaning i have to be a return customer, not a fan)...The technician, Kara, was very nice and applied the lashes properly and with precision. She does her job well, in what she was trained to do. But if you want a custom look this may not be the place for you. I normally get a custom look at another place and when I showed pictures and explained how, I still received the full lash they normally give. Not preferred but okay, I can deal with it. I have had the lashes in for about a week and only a few have fallen out, which only supports my statement above that Kara did her job well!  She explained how to take care of them and provided a little goodie bag that also included instructions.

25.description: Chicago Lashes and I got off to a rough start and I was feeling pretty upset that my appointments were cancelled twice (after booking in August) in the two weeks before my wedding. Part of my frustration was doubtless bridezilla reaction, but I was ready to move on to another salon.They called me back and offered me my previously cancelled date & time at ZERO charge with Jennifer (the owner) to compensate for the run-around in scheduling.  I had my appointment tonight and I love my lashes. Jennifer took the time to make sure I knew what I was asking for and adjusted accordingly. She was very sweet and explained all the recent upheaval at the salon (which had caused my displacement).  She was also very polite about my initial reaction to the cancellation. I couldn't have asked for a more relaxing evening, and am so excited to have glam lashes for my wedding photos.

12.description: I have to be honest, I had never done eyelash extensions until right before the day I got married. I wanted longer and fuller lashes for my special day, so I checked this place out. Crystal took care of me at Chicago Lashes, and I felt really comfortable while she worked on me. The results were AMAZING! Many girls I hear from just dread having extensions, but somehow my experience at this place was phenomenal. I was camera ready, for sure! Use them on your special day or just on a regular day. Looking gorgeous doesn't have to involve tons of money or be painful  :)

59.description: I've been coming to Chicago Lashes for the last year.  It's a great place to get lashes done.  Prices are reasonable thanks to nice deals here and there.  Due to my erratic work schedule, I always have to book my appointments somewhat last minute, so I've had them done by at least 4 lash technicians, and they have all been fantastic.  They all do a great job and have all been equally meticulous.  This is such a great place that  I wouldn't go anywhere else to get my lashes done!

21.description: Areta is INCREDIBLE for hair extensions. She does such an amazing job and makes sure your happy with it. She is so sweet and you can really tell she loves what she does. I also get my lashes done and Moon is the girl to see. She takes her time and makes sure your lashes look incredible. I am constantly getting complaints for both my hair and lashes. So happy I found Chicago lashes!

17.description: Areta is INCREDIBLE for hair extensions. She does such an amazing job and makes sure your happy with it. She is so sweet and you can really tell she loves what she does. I also get my lashes done and Moon is the girl to see. She takes her time and makes sure your lashes look incredible. I am constantly getting complaints for both my hair and lashes. So happy I found Chicago lashes!

10.description: They have a great new customer special, which I used to get my first set of eyelash extensions. That's all I would recommend. Get a first set with them and move on to a more quality place. Their fills are expensive and the glue has strong fumes that burn your eyes. The woman I am a regular with now had some critical things to say about the quality of their extensions and how it damaged my eyelashes. In sum, take advantage of their deal and move on.

5.description: This is my 2nd review for Chicago Lashes. I didn't make an appointment and was desperate to get some lashes put on for the weekend so I went to another lash salon to have it done. It was awful, I found myself pulling out when I got home. It was clumpy and cheap looking. I went back to Chicago Lashes to see Jenny and she gave me my full and natural looking lashes back! I also get my hair extensions and recently started to take my daughter for hair extensions at CL. She loves it! It really does look full and natural and stays on for many months. Thank you Jenny for my great looking lashes and for our fabulous hair!

3.description: They did a great job following up with me. Chamille did an excellent job with my lashes. I couldn't have asked her for more. Chicago lashes did a great job calling me back and getting my lashes fixed immediately. They won't lose this customer!

35.description: Addicted to this place!  LOVE, LOVE, LOVE Camille!  She does such an amazing job and is just so sweet!

19.description: I decided to wait a couple of days before posting another review and WOW! What a difference.Moon started off looking at my face shape and asking me questions about how I wear my makeup. Then she got me comfortable and set to work. An hour and a half later she was done and this time they looked even better. But not to moon, so she had me lay back down to tweak her work.She then explained how to take care of them and gave me some tips.I've only lost a few lashes and I've knocked a large chunk of time off my makeup routine...which my boyfriend loves.I'll definitely be back. How a company handles their customers says a lot. Chicago lashes have earned their stars plus a few extra in my book

28.description: The first time I went was the beginning of the month. I had gotten eyelash flairs from a place in the burbs and it was awful! So I had gone to Chicago Lashes to get those bad boys taken off and to get a whole new set. I used a Living Social deal for $89 for a full set. The place gets super busy, but I got really lucky and was able to get an appt right away the next day. I had my appointment with Michelle. She is GREAT!! She spent at least an hour on my lashes! I was so comfortable, I'm pretty sure I fell asleep for a little bit. By the time she was done, my lashes looked AMAZING!!!! She did exactly what I wanted - natural, full, cat-eye lash extensions!! I was sooooooo happy!!!! It was perfect!!!! The second time I went was a couple days ago. This time I took my sister to get hers done. She had an appt for the same deal with Bambi. Again, AMAZING job!!!! My sister had natural beautiful eyelashes at the end!!! Loved it!!!!So needless to say, both my experiences here have been absolutely awesome!!! I'm definitely gonna come back here anytime I need my lashes done!!! Such a cute girly fun place with awesome staff in a pretty convenient location if you live in the city.

45.description: This is my second review!! Second time coming here and I got the Kim K eyelashes cause they had a special for it this monthl!! Now this is the look for my eyes..  Of course Amanda is amazinggggg as usual!!! She's so awesome at what she does and very personable !! She's precise and efficient.. of course I was late again by 15 min but coming from the south side lol.. the 45 min to hour bus train walk is worth it!  Of course I called them to let them know I was going to be a little late and they accommodated me thank god and I greatly appreciate it but since I have Amanda as my eyelash stylist she finished in no time at all like i wasn't late and finished early!! I almost cheated on her with someone else but I decided not to cause she is the best in my eyes or should I say on my eyelashes lol.. So if you want the best and fastest come here and book with Amanda!!! The staff is always friendly as usual and awesome..Thanks James... They were also able to accommodate me with a hair extension consultation with Daria right afterwards... I met with her and I felt good vibes with her and she was very informative and it was a great consult, and it was more affordable than I thought.. She knows what she's doing and very friendly.. So I'll definitely be back for my first ever hair extensions!!! yay!!! Thanks once again Amanda, Daria, and James.. (I think that's his name the person whom I spoke with at the salon lol)

33.description: This place is incredible. I am hooked. I go back every two to three weeks for my fill. Their prices are the best around. I adore Camille she is the best!!! I've also gone to Michelle, she is good too! Everyone there is super nice. I am all about fake lashes; At this place I save money going here over buying them and applying the fake strips myself. I think every girl should try this!!! Especially for major events.

43.description: Disappointed. My tech Michelle seemed really new. It took the full 2 hours. I obviously couldn't see what she was doing, but it felt like put in two lashes, wait, comb it out, wait some more, etc. The manager walked in and had to tell her where to fix it. The rooms are also shared, so I could hear everything they were talking about. And, the girl next to me probably came in 30 mins after me and left before me, which made me feel even worse! And after all that, it doesn't seem like my lashes look very full. She said I probably got between 65-120 lashes on each eye.  That's a big window! The voucher I bought said a full set of mink lashes, but what she used was synthetic. Honestly, I don't mind synthetic, but she should have at least offered what I paid for. Overall, pretty underwhelmed, especially considering the yelp reviews. Maybe I just got the wrong tech!

2.description: Normal I'm satisfied but today my appointment was for 4pm and now it's 4:17 and I haven't been seen. I asked if there is a grace period for late appointments and the host stated 15-20min I then asked will there be a discount since my provider is late and she says we can't guarantee the time you are serviced. Anyone else see something wrong with the customer needing to be one time but risk cancellation but the provider doesn't need to be on time?? Hmm this will probably be my last time here. It's 40min from my house anyway!

18.description: Don't go there! It took me 3 refills to figure out that their work is mediocre at best. If it is the only place you went to, try somewhere else. Every time I went the girls used excessive glue. The extensions were struck together in a bulk, sometimes over multiple natural lashes, which damaged them. Not to mention the fact that they were so rigid at the base that my lids would hurt when I blinked!But the last session was way to much! The protection covering my bottom lashes moved, so I had the glue sticking the upper lashed to the bottom ones. So, instead of using a glue-remover, Raquel had the brilliant idea of cutting the lashes that had gotten stuck!!! No ladies, no matter what they tell you, they do not grow back! At least not very fast. I have been staring at my bold spot for months now!Then I tried somewhere else and I realized the difference! With Nancy, you cannot see the glue at all! Even if I stare really really close in the mirror. And when the extensions start falling, my natural lashes do not fall with them as with Chicago Lashes work.If you are planning to go, think again!!!!

41.description: Buyer beware: you get what you pay for. I booked an appointment for a full set with Bambi. A typically 2+ hour process took under one hour--including a lash removal from a previous fill. They looked surprisingly good at first glance (albeit contact-free with the sting of glue still lingering). Upon further review at my home mirror, the extensions seem to be laid on top of my real lashes and glue spread over them. Many bases of the lashes were on top of my lid. In addition, several extensions were clumped together on one side. It's been 16 days since I had my lashes done and the remaining lashes are irritating my eyelids and going in several directions. Not to mention, I've been losing several eyelashes (probably due to her accidentally gluing 2 to 1 lash).That being said-Chicago Lashes is cheap and has convenient hours. Maybe try someone else...actually, a friend also tried this place out with Amanda and said all her lashes fell off within a few days. Hmm. Maybe not.

52.description: What a score! I randomly stumbled across this place and I'm so glad that I did. Felicia did a sick job, she gave me the most amazing set of full luscious lashes that still look natural- I can't believe how precise and meticulous she was. I get complimented on them all the time and only half the time I admit that they're extensions lol! You really cannot tell! I've already had them in place for almost 3 months which I hear is way longer than most places so in my opinion they were totally worth it!! Now I'm addicted to the whole look of them and the fact that I'm in the gym, dripping with sweat, but my eyes look so bright, open and refreshed. Love it!

50.description: I'm writing my second review on yelp for this salon because they deserve it. The location is convenient even for me who comes from the northwest suburbs, it's a straight shot down Addison Ave after I get off I-90 and for the most part, traffic and parking isn't terrible when you book appointments at non-rush hour times or when there's a Cubs game.The scheduling system is really easy as I have been using their online booking system via Vagaro on my iPhone. I can select the tech I want, and find available appointment slots for any particular day. And for the most part, appointments run on time. The few times my appointments have run late have been either my own fault for running late (but often been caught up with the girls' efficiency) or the precious customer has run them late. It happens but really not often at all.The lashes, glue and work are excellent. I have gone to two different lash places before in the beginning, spent more money and was not half as satisfied. My lashes typically last 3-4 weeks before needing a refill and that's with me working out (and sweating) 4-5 times a week, and have gone swimming during the summer. Obviously, you do have to take good care of your lashes at home and not pick at them throughout each day. The one time my lashes did not even last a week, I notified them and they offered to fix them for free which I thought was very good customer service as they were prompt about addressing my dissatisfaction.Customer service is really good here.

4.description: Every women's dream is to have full, thick, beautiful lashes. Well, I don't know about you.. But buying the cheap little eyelash strips from wall-mart are always a pain in the butt to get on and off! So, I decided to do some research about professional eyelash extensions. The one eyelash salon that kept appearing everywhere was the one and only Chicago Lashes. Thanks to the wonderful Yelp reviews here, and recommendations amongst those who know a thing or two about eyelashes, I decided to try this place: and the end results are PHENOMENAL.I called this salon to book an appointment on Tuesday and was very fortunate to be able to get an appointment two days later at 9:00AM (Which is great because this salon is always very busy!)The receptionist, James (Who I believe is also the store manager as well) Greeted me  with enthusiasm and cheerfulness the moment I walked into the door. He told me to have a seat, and that Moon (the lash technician) would be with me momentarily. He offered me tea, water, and even coffee too while waiting. I got a chance to look around- and this place was not only very clean, but very well decorated! The cute chairs at the front of the shop were super comfy as well. Moon greeted me with a warm smile, and inquired if I had lashes before. I informed her this would be my first time, and she grabbed a book (that contained pictures of various lashes) and we sat down for several minutes discussing the options at hand. She didn't rush me at all, and was very comforting to converse with. We decided for a semi natural look- which would add just the amount of 'glam' I wanted, while keeping it natural looking as well.I laid down and Moon began her work, explaining every little detail- every process of the way. Eventually, I fell asleep, and the next thing I knew, my lashes were complete! I believe it took about a full 2 hours- which is great! Moon handed me the mirror and I FELL IN LOVE WITH MY LASHES! They were perfect! The experience at Chicago Lashes was absolutely wonderful! Park was a breeze (a whole bunch of spots right outside the salon). I will definitely be back as a continuing customer and I highly recommend this salon!!

6.description: I never thought my hair could look this good! Everyone there is great, but I think Daria might be a miracle worker. She matched my hair perfectly, placed my extensions expertly so I don't have to worry about the bonds showing. I couldn't be happier!I can't imagine not having extensions in from now on!

22.description: Marie at Chicago Lashes did a natural look, lash extension for me. It was fantastic. No pain, easy application, no stinging and beautifully done. She took my look up a level without making it over done. Marie also educated me on how to care for my lashes. They held for three weeks, probably could have gone longer but I was looking to have them removed instead of filled. My real lashes were not harmed, did not fall out and were the same intensity as before the extensions. Thanks again Marie.

15.description: The first time I went was the beginning of the month. I had gotten eyelash flairs from a place in the burbs and it was awful! So I had gone to Chicago Lashes to get those bad boys taken off and to get a whole new set. I used a Living Social deal for $89 for a full set. The place gets super busy, but I got really lucky and was able to get an appt right away the next day. I had my appointment with Michelle. She is GREAT!! She spent at least an hour on my lashes! I was so comfortable, I'm pretty sure I fell asleep for a little bit. By the time she was done, my lashes looked AMAZING!!!! She did exactly what I wanted - natural, full, cat-eye lash extensions!! I was sooooooo happy!!!! It was perfect!!!! The second time I went was a couple days ago. This time I took my sister to get hers done. She had an appt for the same deal with Bambi. Again, AMAZING job!!!! My sister had natural beautiful eyelashes at the end!!! Loved it!!!!So needless to say, both my experiences here have been absolutely awesome!!! I'm definitely gonna come back here anytime I need my lashes done!!! Such a cute girly fun place with awesome staff in a pretty convenient location if you live in the city.

57.description: I came to give this place a shot from a deal I had seen online, and worked with Amanda. She was quick, and sweet. I didn't feel like I got a full set of lashes though. She gave me a more natural look as opposed to the Kim Kardashian look that I was expecting as well. I still got compliments on them, but I wanted them to stand out more and to be dramatic. I figure if I do it, I want to go all the way. The second time around Bambi worked on my lashes and she did them with the thicker lashes that gave more of the look I wanted. My only complaint is that I feel like they used to be more fuller and thicker.

20.description: The service here was amazing! I am nine months pregnant and I was a little fuzzy at first when I  was laying down because my back started hurting but she did not complain about my fuzziness . I had Jennifer and she did the best job and it was quick! I just got done with my appointment and my lashes look amazing :) hopefully my lashes stay this good for my baby shower. I definitely will be coming back . Thanks Chicago Lashes for making my eyelashes look amazing

36.description: Im giving this place 3 stars BUT i want to give eyelash extensions in general ZERO STARS! It was not this places fault but my eyes do NOT like extensions want to warn you ladies you will LOSE your eyelashes after you get extensions glued on. The night after getting the extensions I quickly found out that as a side sleeper, I could only sleep on my back of I would crush my eyelashes and thus bend them into my own eye causing red teary eyes, or wake up with kinked ratty lashes the next morning. They began to come out unevenly (because our own eyelashes fall out unevenly) and there were no lashes where the fake ones had fallen out. It took me months to grow my natural eyelashes back. This is a big no.

14.description: I took a close friend of mine here to get her eye lash extensions for a musical. I read about this place online and was impressed. We were both pleasantly surprised at how great of a job they did! Wonderful place, particularly for actors who need special work for shows.

attributes.Hair Types Specialized In: African-American Hair, Asian Hair, Curly Hair, Extensions

3.description: Wing stop has the greasiest wings I have ever tasted. I ordered Parmesan garlic. They fry the tiny chicken legs and wings, slather on melted garlic butter, and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese. This place did not meet my expectation and because I was downing straight fat, I felt disgusting afterwards. I haven't been back to this place since then.

1.description: Called at 11:10pm to place a carry out order and wing stop refused to take order since they close at midnight !?! Must be nice to stay clocked in and close earlier than advertised time.

2.description: This was my 1st time at this wing stop. And it just opened. So with that in mind my service was very nice. Very simple menu. The service was nice I even got a cup of water while my chicken and fries was cooked fresh to order.I love fresh cut fries so wing stop hit a home run with that  ohhh yeahhh and hot hot wings. My son and I had a finger licking good time.Ah yeah how could I forget to mention the hot rolls with butter (yummy)So its plenty of parking in the parking lotGood luck wing stop. Happy to have you in our area....Will be back for more..

5.description: I'm a big fan of wings top the first one I tried was by Harlem and been hooked. Glad we finally have great wings around the area.

6.description: I was harassed by the workers and was extremely uncomfortable with the language and things they were saying towards me and my friend. The amount of inappropriate comments they made towards me was unbelievable.

7.description: Wings and sauces were okay. I've had better.  At least it's better than buffalo wings and rings.

8.description: First time here. The tast of wing is below average. The coating is too thick and hard, and I had Louisiana flavor which is a little bit salty.

0.description: Clean Fast serviceConsistent with the taste Wings are delicious, fries are even better. Friendly staff, quick service, clean restaurant. Oh and this location has 60 cent boneless wings on Monday and Tuesday. I'm not a fan of boneless wings but their boneless wings are moist and not dry like other places.

4.description: I would like to have given it three stars but I found the family pack meal to be a total downer. We pay about $1.00 a wing we ordered $30 worth of wings in a family pack only wings come with it not a family pack to me. I can go to any other wing restaurant and get at least some celery sticks and ranch dressing and bread. This place only gives you wings and no side items. Even Popeyes has a family pack that includes sides yes it cost about $30 to get a family deal from Popeyes now too but at least we get some sides. Let's gone on with the actual wings.They were okay not the most appealing looking of wings the sauce looks very saucy but in a way where I felt turned off. But they tasted fine. I wouldn't go back unless other friends wanted to order from there for some reason. I prefer Mariano's chicken wings and Hooters and Ricobene's over Wing Stop.

58.description: The garlic Parmesan wings were some of the best I ever had! The kitchen is open late which is great for those late night wing cravings!!

56.description: We've been coming here for a few years. It's a good place if you're craving wings and are in the area. I usually get the boneless buffalo & sweet BBQ (both mild). My bf gets the boneless Garlic Q (extra hot) but he claims it wasn't hot but still finds the wings very tasty. We've never been here when it's crowded so our service is always fast and friendly. Definitely a place to consider when you just want good wings!

29.description: REALLY?!?! I placed an order for delivery and received an email confirmation saying it'd be here an hour later. When that hour arrived, I received another email saying it would be another hour. I called ro see why it was taking 2 hrs to make an order of 5 Buffalo Wings and Enchiladas only to find they cancelled the order because my house was 1 Block from their boundaries.  1. You didn't think it best to CALL the customer rather than send an email stating it'd take ANOTHER HOUR.2. Even after confirming they delivered to me the night before...that made no difference. I am literally 1 block from their so called boundary. Some people use delivery services because they don't own a vehicle, but that isn't the point. They clearly don't value customer service. Never again.

42.description: The service here is pretty good as is the food and drinks. I have never been in and not been greeted with a smile or left without one. Lots of televisions with a wide variety of sports and as many wings as I want. The only reason I don't rate 5 stars is because nothing is perfect. I would definitely recommend them!

23.description: The wings and aioli fries are good here , but the workers are straight hood at this location  :/ we walked in and it took the hostess a good 5 minutes to acknowledge us and did not even say hi . And our waitress asked us what did we want?!? Not to mention how many times we saw these waitresses on their phones and pulling  wedgies out their asses in front of us ! Um don't think I'll be coming to this location ever again .

47.description: Decent food and drinks priced just right.Really wish they would have their own parking lot. It's always an issue finding parking at that location

8.description: food was ok service was horrible they need mpre waitresses......i wont be coming back here

31.description: didnt eat anythjg here but the spinach dip because i was still full from grillin out at the sox game. went here with a large group and was seated pretty quick for being a saturday afternoon after a sox game! everyone seemed to enjoy what they got. i know they had those tall mega pitchers of beer though!

34.description: I live right near here now so I checked it out, sadly I was let down, first off it took forever to get our food, almost an hour and it wasn't even that busy, I got boneless wings which were kinda dry and not crispy, the coleslaw was bad, iT was bland and tasted like no other coleslaw i had had before, my dad got the burger which he didn't like either, it had a pretty good beer selection which I'll give credit for, and my brother enjoyed his wrap, maybe it was just a bad day so I won't totally write them off yet, but it wasn't a good first impression

16.description: Good food, Good friendly service, Decent prices, Tv's all over to watch the games. We usually run into someone we know because my husband is from that neighborhood. Free parking in rear (if there is a space) clean, paper towels on the tables so you don't have to worry about asking for extra napkins. I would have gave five stars but the wings tough very good are pretty basic

13.description: Staff is always curtious and fast with your order. The wings are a great for the most part. The staff are always great with myself and my kids.

11.description: My girlfriend and I order from here on Friday for delivery. We had a large order because we order food for us and the kids. The girl who took our order was very nice and repeated our order to make sure that everything was correct. Our food finally arrives and as we are  unpacking we noticed that we were missing what I ordered a veggie quesadilla. Which is understandable people make mistakes.My girlfriend calls and different girl answers the phone. My girlfriend explained to her that we just had a delivery and we're missing an item. The girl on the phone was very rude and didn't even apologize she told my girlfriend that it would take almost two hours to get the item we're missing. I told my girlfriend not worry about it and just get a refund. She ask just get a refund because that was to long of a wait .I heard the girl give out  the biggest sigh over the phone like she just asked for the most impossible thing in the world. Then I hear her say very loud and extremely rude so you want your money back? (I was not standing right next to my girlfriend I was standing a few Inches away) After I heard this I told my girlfriend to just to get the food instead if its to much of A hassle to do a simple refund.  I then hear the girl almost yelling so you don't want to refund you want the food instead?  My girlfriend said yes  and the girl said fine whatever and hung up the phone. Moral  of the story here  is the food is pretty good. however there is an extremely rude girl that works their . I feel sorry of anyone else who has dealt with her. Side note I got my veggie quesadilla in 30 minutes and not two hours like the girl had said

39.description: Good Food,  cheap drinks,  and a very large restaurant for the city.  Plus they have FREE PARKING and a FREE SHUTTLE  to/from Sox Games.  The amount of $$ you would spend parking will pay for one person's food and a couple beers.  Definitely worth going to before or after a game and even during the off season or to watch a game there.

37.description: I tend to come here often and I love the wings and beer. The servers usually are great, but last night our server was a mess she seriously would walk past us and not even ask if we needed something! Foods great but the service their sucks!

0.description: Last night was my second time here and I have to say that I love this place! This is my first time checking them out on Yelp and some of these low review ratings have shocked me. Not only are their wings great, but so is their service. Before I get started I have to comment on the service. My first time there our waitress wasn't that great, but last night Melissa took care of us and she was great! She mentioned that she was new and that was nervous about a big group ordering the party platter, but she was very nice/energetic and funny! Whoever is in charge of hiring made a good choice. We were a party of 7 and ordered a party platter. It consists of 75 wings and 4 appetizers for $85, if you don't think that's a deal then I don't know what is! You can get the flavors in quantities of 4. They have a beer tube, which is pretty awesome and if you've never had Parmesan fries, try them!! Personally, I had never been in the Bridgeport neighborhood, but I'd definitely keep going back for these wings.

38.description: The wings r the best . I literally left bww because they fell off . Wings here r juicy and have sauce :) definitely recommend it to other . U can't go wrong wit free parking and shuttle to sox park !!!!

51.description: I have been to Buffalo Wings & Rings a few times, but this is my first time writing a review.  The environment is very sporty and they have nice looking bar. There are many tvs and a projection screen with all types of games going on. Also, there seems to be plenty of street parking with pay stations.I actually stopped in 01/24/15 with my cousin. It wasn't super-busy and we were served quite quickly. We ordered onion rings, 5 Boneless Buffalo wings, & 10 Boneless Bourbon BBQ wings, celery sticks and 2 cokes. Everything tasted great and our order came out quickly.Our bill was about $30 which wasn't too bad, considering we had enough left overs for later.  I do have to say that if you go in on a Tuesday or Wednesday, those are the days you will get the best value on wings or tenders.Will visit again to redeem coupon for 5 free wings when you fill out their survey=)

27.description: Free parking in rear is a plus. Today (Tuesday) they have $.69 wings (traditional/boneless) definitely a good deal and at 4pm place wasn't packed. Server was very polite and on top of things.Sweet Thai Sauce-Medium was my favorite

32.description: Love the chicken tenders and seasoned potato wedges.  Beer selection is ok, could be better, but they do have some craft beers.  Two Brothers,  Lagunitas, Revolution, etc.

54.description: What a great find!  The wings were fresh and the sauces were tasty.  We tried the lemon pepper medium and the bbq wings.  I would've gave them 5 stars but the coleslaw was dry and not tangy enough.  The fries and fried pickles were delish.  I also ordered celery sticks and they were by far the freshest, juiciest I've ever had.  I have found my new favorite wing joint!!!

48.description: I have no complaints besides the wings were a bit over cooked so they were kinda tough. I still ate them though lol. Cool place to just grab food and watch a game

44.description: My boyfriend and I checked out this place for the first time last night after finding out they won Best of Fest in this year's Wingfest. I'm so glad we did!Our server was very nice and checked on us at the right times.We got the Pomegranate margarita,  classic margarita to start off and then the  margarita 1800, and the rum hurricane to drink with our meals. They were all good drinks, however they were a bit on the weak side. Good nonetheless! !!For starters,  we had gotten the potato skins, while a bit on the small side, they were very good. Loved the bacon, cheese and scallions! After all the food we got, I'm glad they were the size they were.After that, of course we had the 10 piece hot, buffalo chicken wings, and a steak and mushroom quesadilla to go with them. The sauce on those wings was delicious, while spicy, but the spice didn't cover up the flavor. The ranch was just the icing on the cake. Very good.The steak quesadilla had a dipping sauce that kind of had a taste of blue cheese. My boyfriend and I aren't fans of blue cheese so we just dipped the quesadilla in the Buffalo sauce. Haha! The steak on there though was more like a ground beef type of thing, but no complaints here! The quesadilla itself was a very good size and perfect for sharing.After having the potato skins,  wings, quesadilla and drinks, you'd think we'd be good and ready to go, but while I'm the sweets girl, I can't leave a place without having dessert! On the menu, you see a very enticing picture of the chocolate lava turtle cake and I for sure had to get that.  Once that came out it was topped off with a scoop of ice cream and chocolate drizzle. It was very nice and It satisfied my sweet tooth! Once my spoon went into it, it exploded with all this chocolatey goodness just like a volcano. Love!! A good way to end a meal =)Overall, this was a very cool place. Great to get together with friends and have good food and drinks as well as for watching sporting events! There are many screens of different sizes throughout the place. Everything is fairly priced and you surely get a bang for your buck! My boyfriend and I will surely return =)

24.description: I never have bad service here, the wings are top notch, the managers Justin and Mike are stand up guys that take care of their customers...my friends from Minnesota make this a destination when they're in the city

7.description: I live right near here now so I checked it out, sadly I was let down, first off it took forever to get our food, almost an hour and it wasn't even that busy, I got boneless wings which were kinda dry and not crispy, the coleslaw was bad, iT was bland and tasted like no other coleslaw i had had before, my dad got the burger which he didn't like either, it had a pretty good beer selection which I'll give credit for, and my brother enjoyed his wrap, maybe it was just a bad day so I won't totally write them off yet, but it wasn't a good first impression

49.description: This place went down hill!!   Was there a couple days ago and decided to order the classic burger..  Burger arrives and I open it up and only notice two old looking pickles and one piece of lettuce??   I ask the server what happened to the onions and tomato??  Server tells me "oh, prices for tomatoes and onions are up so we don't include them in the burger unless requested!"  WTF!!!    Anyhow last time I step close to this joint!

40.description: Worst service ever. took 25 mins for the server to bring a drink from the bar during lunch hour .. Then finally asked us if we wanted to order - waiting another twenty minutes for the appetizer - he brought the appetizer platter out and did not bring us any plates or silverware . We didn't see him for another 30 minutes . And we're still on our first drink .. We ordered another drink finally , and that took at least 20 mins for him to bring us it and the beers were warm like they had been sitting there . I was ready to order from the bar myself ! The place was not even crowded ... We finally ordered our wings and of course waited ! Luckily we had time to kill but did not tip the guy because of the service . He was also not friendly or welcoming, he acted like I was imposing on his busy schedule .

53.description: We  went last night and we were very impressed. The food was good and service was excellent.  We may become a regulars there.

30.description: Food is awesome! I love their fries. Nice ambiance. Nice staff. Sometimes they take longer then usual but it's worth it. They I've one small ranch container which isn't enough. Could be a bit cheaper but nonetheless I love it!

46.description: This is my third time here. I have been here watching sport in events and each time it gets live. I absolutely love it here. The bartenders are usually good thr food is great. Sometimes the olace can be a little pricey but the atmosphere definitely makes up for it

1.description: I have came twice to this location. I felt I should review this place since it has lots of variability in its ratings. Both times, I have been very pleased with the food and the service is good as well. I was especially satisfied last time I went and had Melissa as my server. We had a group of 7 people and she warned us that it was her first day on the job. She did great! Very attentive and funny. She would always check up on us and made sure our food was fresh.We had a party platter type deal. I believe it included 75 wings and 4 appetizers for around $85. We felt this was a good deal since the appetizers were delicious (make sure to try the parmesan fries!) and the wings were juicy, hot, and the sauces were great. Completely drenched in sauce! Definitely beats out other major wing places where there is lots of breading and the meat is dry. Our group is definitely dining here again.Hope this review helps those who are unsure about this place because of the mixed ratings!

55.description: Love love love this place! Lemon pepper tenders are to die for! Decent prices and I love that they have a kids menu for my one year old. If I could eat here everyday, I think I would! Always get great customer service,and that makes dining in wonderful.

9.description: Okay, I had to add a star. Went back the other day for 69 cent wings...it wasn't quite dinner time yet so they weren't too busy. Service was quick and friendly. Food came out fast and was delicious. Get the garlic-q sauce, it's awesome. If you're in the neighborhood and craving wings, this place is worth a try.

26.description: Pretty basic wing place. The service generally sucks no matter how busy it is. My bf used to work there and in the middle of taking our order the waitress asks him if I'm his gf. Not only is this inappropriate (he didn't know her) but rude and honestly, none of her business. She literally cut him off while he was telling her his order and blurted this out. Very awkward. And because of her interruption our order came out wrong. I love the garlic Parmesan fries and will come here because it's walking distance from my house but it's nothing special.

25.description: The server was friendly the atmosphere literally felt like I walked in Buffalo Wild Wings, except the wings aren't as good. Beware of the potato Wedges, they are very skimpy.

12.description: Pretty basic wing place. The service generally sucks no matter how busy it is. My bf used to work there and in the middle of taking our order the waitress asks him if I'm his gf. Not only is this inappropriate (he didn't know her) but rude and honestly, none of her business. She literally cut him off while he was telling her his order and blurted this out. Very awkward. And because of her interruption our order came out wrong. I love the garlic Parmesan fries and will come here because it's walking distance from my house but it's nothing special.

59.description: wow the service here makes me feel like they are doing me a favor. ive gotten charged for drinks i never got, the bathrooms are digusting, and the staff has an air of arragonce mixed with ratchet.  I dread going there but i meet up my friends here because there isnt much else going on in bridgeport. i think what draws people here is the name brand and the prices and specials on drinks. Thats it

21.description: Our little league baseball team just won the Championship at Mcguane park today and I wanted to celebrated the victory . I called to ask to speak to the manager and Justin answered .  He was awesome he took care of us right away and made sure we had a table waiting for us . He congratulated our boys about our victory and treated us like a pro team . This place has great service and the food was outstanding !!!!!  The whole staff really went above and beyond to make sure our boys where happy. And this was no easy task because I called 30 minutes before our game ended to see if they had room to seat all of ours boys and Justin delivered had our table ready and waiting . I will recommended everyone to come here because they made all of us feel very important . Thank you for EXCELLENT service and food . We will be back .

17.description: Okay came here after much thought, hoping the service had gotten better.... yeah, NOT! If we come here again after today we will only sit right at the bar. The table service SUCKS.. my one friend and i ordered our food and when our 3rd person joined us they ordered food, there was about 15 minutes between orders, how did the second order arrive before the first? The server didn't come to check to see if we needed anything,  we had to hunt her down... waited about 45mins for her to return to table to get our bill, ordered one last beer and got the change for that beer and not the beer for almost 10mins... wth has happened to this place? The service used to be great but now it SUCKS... we live in the neighborhood and like this place is close, but we will now travel and tip elsewhere. ..

10.description: Free parking in rear is a plus. Today (Tuesday) they have $.69 wings (traditional/boneless) definitely a good deal and at 4pm place wasn't packed. Server was very polite and on top of things.Sweet Thai Sauce-Medium was my favorite

5.description: Plenty of tvs, street parking (metered, non-metered if you don't mind walking half a block), small lot in back. Our server was super nice and changed my life when she recommended the Funnel Stix (funnel cake sticks with ice cream and caramel dips) for dessert. Lit'rally. Changed. My. Life. I had a bit of the chicken tenders and those were good as well, but this review is clearly more about the dessert.

3.description: The manager last night, Justin, is the worst manager I have ever encountered in a restaurant. After waiting around 25 minutes to get our drinks, this guy comes over to the table and does not apologize immediately but instead starts giving us a laundry list of reasons of why we didn't get our drinks in a timely fashion. Seriously? You're going to lay out your ineptness as a manager for the guest and expect that to make us happy. The worst was when he threw the server under the bus and blamed her! If his bosses read this, offer Justin some training on customer service. Guests don't care that the ticket got lost or what you're dealing with regarding another guest that make them "the priority" (this guy was that insulting), you apologize and make the situation better, end of story.

35.description: I came here for lunch today on my lunch break at work. Some people at my work have had bad experiences, but I figured I would see for myself. Now I see what they were talking about. I will not be coming back.Strike 1: We walked in the door and the hostess was taking someone's carry out order. That's fine. But we stood there for over 5 minutes, waiting to be acknowledged, while she explained the different types of sauces to a take-out customer and a line was forming behind me to be seated. Strike 2: When we were finally seated, the table was dirty. There were crumbs all over the table and seat, along with sticky soda glass rings. She obviously did not look at the table before seating us. I asked for someone to wipe it down, and they did.Strike 3: Service was sub-par. The waitress was pretty indifferent towards everyone. She wasn't mean, but she wasn't pleasant either. When she brought our credit card receipt back after paying the bill, she basically threw it on our table and continued walking away. No thank you. No come again.Strike 3.5: The table next to us complained that they have been waiting 50 minutes for their food. The waitress told them that she is not a cook, she's just a waitress and she cannot cook their food or make the cooks work any faster. Wrong answer. They asked to see a manager, who told them the restaurant was busy (it was not) and there are only 2 cooks in the kitchen. Strike 4: We waited at least 45 minutes for our food (I didn't look at the time until after we ordered). I ordered a cheeseburger with onion rings, my husband ordered boneless wings with o-rings, and my son had the kids pizza with fries. All short order food - nothing crazy. When we finally got our food, IT WAS COLD! At least serve us hot food after making us wait 45 minutes. The sauce on my son's pizza was straight out of the fridge, as it was refrigerator temperature. My food and my husband's food was almost room temperature. Our onion rings were definitely sitting around for awhile. The food was OKAY. My burger was nothing special. My husband did not like his wings. The onion rings would have been good if they were hot.Strike 5: No one ever said, "Goodbye. Thank you." Not our waitress. Not the hostess as we left.FYI the place was NOT busy. There were about 8 tables of people, and no big parties. It was probably about 20-30% full. If service was that bad, I would hate to see how bad it is when the restaurant is full. I will not be going back.

19.description: My boyfriend and I were craving wings and neither of us has been here before so we decided to stop in. I got the grilled boneless wings with Buffalo sauce and Parmesan garlic sauce. The chicken was decent and the sauce was very underwhelming. My boyfriend got the regular boneless wings and he did not like them at all; he didn't even eat them all like he usually does! The garlic Parmesan and aoli fries were pretty good though. Service was fine, a little slow, but still fine. All in all, it was OK. Probably wouldn't come back anytime soon.

28.description: I wish there was a way to give this establishment a negative star. I just went into this restaurant to place a to go order and after waiting about 15 minutes, i just left. The one hostess was seating patrons that took approximately 5 minutes then it took almost 10 minutes to take someone else's order. Just completely unacceptable. I usually have a good experience when going here but this time was blah... Not a happy person at all. The waitresses didn't help with seating anybody for the hostess. They just walked right past.

45.description: Fairly standard Buffalo Wild Wings clone. There won't be a whole lot of surprises here -- you get what you expect from a sports bar.  Heck, the name of the place pretty much says it all.The place is pretty big and there are plenty of big screen TVs, making this a great place to catch games. The Wings are pretty big and meaty, and the rings are quite sizable as well. Nothing to write home about, but definitely a solid joint that serves its purpose.

33.description: Went in with a friend after hearing a lot about this place.  Seated in bar area, service was great our waitress was very attentive.  Ordered apps (loved the Thai chili sauce). And boneless wings.  The BBQ sauce was bland and I asked for a side of something hotter.  Real problem was the boneless wings, they were very dry, never had that happen before. Good for a beer and apps before a Sox game, but I'll steer clear for dinner.

43.description: I come here pretty often since my friends love wings with beer! I honesty feel like this place is just okay. It is not fantastic nor is it horrible. It is really just a simple BBW clone. And BBW has better tasting wings... Sorry.On the bright side, whenever I come with a group of people, we always find a seat immediately and never have to wait. So, if you want wings with beer, and do not want to wait every time you come to a restaurant, then stop by!

2.description: This place has really excellent wings and tenders and pretty good burgers (the burgers are small). They have a great deal here on Tuesdays and Wednesdays on the wings/tenders. They also have a great selection of beers, with great ones on special on Tues/Wed. The place is very nice inside and always clean, the food comes out fast and is always good...but you just have to understand that your service will be bad. Management here is rude and was featured on that show Undercover Boss. It's a very Southside Chicago attitude here, so just deal with it. These aren't people who say please and thank you and all that polite stuff. Ever watch Shameless on Showtime? That's the kind of people who run this place and who work here. They all have chips on their shoulders and are surly. Can you deal with that in order to eat some good food and have good beers? Personally, I can ignore the rudeness and the bad service. I don't come here thinking it is a fancy place downtown. I come to watch a game, eat wings, drink beer, and hang out with my friends. But, if you have any friends who are sticklers for service or who get bent out of shape easy with a bad waitress or manager who could care less about what customers think, then you shouldn't come here. This is not the place for you. These are not polite or nice people who work here. They kind of act like it is Dick's Last Resort or something.

18.description: The server was friendly the atmosphere literally felt like I walked in Buffalo Wild Wings, except the wings aren't as good. Beware of the potato Wedges, they are very skimpy.

41.description: I've been visiting this place regularly since they opened and short of the usual misadventure here and there with any establishment, I have always been happy with the food and service at BWR. A lot of people like to call this place a knock off of Buffalo Wild Wings and aside from them being in the same genre of restaurant, that's where the similarities end. BWR is in a superior class by itself because it is not hindered by the burdern of being a heavily advertised national chain, thus it doesn't take itself too seriously. They have better food, better drink & food specials and a better atmosphere. Whether you are passing through for a couple of drinks after work or getting a group together for a night out, you'll enjoy yourself here.

52.description: Love the wings here!! The sauces are awesome, & they have a wide variety of menu items for every taste. Excellent beer/cocktail menu, as well. The perfect spot to catch a game, because they have dozens of hd tvs throughout the place. Thumbs way up!!

50.description: Terrible staff. They're always in a bad mood and will treat you poorly. Ordered one time over the phone and the person on the other line gave me a really sour attitude. Definitely taking my business elsewhere. This isn't the only place that sells wings, cheap beer, and watered down jack&cokes

4.description: Buffalo Wings and Rings is the only sports bar located in Bridgeport.  There are ample meter parking and a couple of free spots located in the rear.  This is just like your typical sports bar: tons of tv, loud music, and a large variety of beer and drinks.  To me, the ambiance resembles a lot like Buffalo Wild Wings, but the food and service are not on par.I would occasionally come here if my friends want to meet up over a game.  There is usually tables available without a wait time.  I have tried a variety of items on the menu.  Most of the items are either overly seasoned or no flavor at all.  Also, their "famous" wings are extremely dry and overcooked. The service here isn't great either.  It usually takes a while for someone to even greet you no matter how slow or busy the bar is.  The food doesn't come out in a reasonable time nor does anyone come check on you.  Definitely avoid coming here if you can.  Make the extra trip to Southloop.  There you can find the original Buffalo Wild Wings.

6.description: This is my "go-to" bar in Bridgeport. A carbon copy of BWWs, so if you like BWW, then you will like this place. Easy to park on Halsted and far enough away from Comisky that its not crowded before games. Meet all your friends here before/after a game. No crowds.

22.description: Just ordered delivery last night - traditional and boneless wings, onion rings and mozzarella sticks.  First, we received the order extremely quickly - under a half an hour which is fantastic.  Second, the mozz sticks were pretty large and lots of cheese so we were impressed that they didnt seem like frozen sticks with very little cheese that all comes out with the first bite leaving just the breading.  onion rings were still crispy and delicious.  the wings were great - good quallity chicken, slightly crispy and lots of sauce, including tons of dipping sauce.  not sure about the in-restaurant service that some people are complaining about, but definitely super awesome for delivery!

15.description: REALLY?!?! I placed an order for delivery and received an email confirmation saying it'd be here an hour later. When that hour arrived, I received another email saying it would be another hour. I called ro see why it was taking 2 hrs to make an order of 5 Buffalo Wings and Enchiladas only to find they cancelled the order because my house was 1 Block from their boundaries.  1. You didn't think it best to CALL the customer rather than send an email stating it'd take ANOTHER HOUR.2. Even after confirming they delivered to me the night before...that made no difference. I am literally 1 block from their so called boundary. Some people use delivery services because they don't own a vehicle, but that isn't the point. They clearly don't value customer service. Never again.

57.description: This is my favorite place in south Chicago. This is a great sports bar with nice food served. There are not so many veggie options as its a wing joint. However, we still used to order onion rings, fries, tacos, nachos, spinach artichoke dip and many more. Their southwestern veggie burger and fried pickle burgers are a bliss.Potato skins are awesome as well and tastes better with buffalo wing sauce. Great place to watch a game and have a drink. The atmosphere is mostly noisy in the weekend but still the ambience is awesome inside. Pretty big restaurant with not much waiting time. Little slow over the weekend due to a large crowd but its obviously a place to relax and watch games on big screens.

20.description: Was I missing something? My friend and I went here because we heard they won the chicago wing fest last year.  I tried 5 different wing flavors. The bbq was bland, the Thai chili and peach habenero I thought were going to be on the hotter side but had absolutely no heat what so ever.  The only two that I thought had potential was the lemon pepper and their signature bourbon.  My one regret was I didn't put any of the medium or hot sauce mixed in.  Is this the secret for this place? If that is I will have to go back but so far the only thing this place had going for it was all the baseball games on tv.  Which made me want to start chanting "O - VER - RATE - ED"

36.description: Besides the food sometimes arriving to you cold there is another reason to avoid this joint. You would think it would be a good family oriented place........NOT.......For some reason this place gets its share of brawlers and looney tunes. A fight can pop off in here at any given time.  If you have your ground fighting techniques up to snuff take your chances in here you'll probably get to use them.

14.description: I was just in for a family event.. The beer and food was great but the workers were unbelievably rude.. I definitely will be calling to speak to the manager.. One one staff member was rude but all but two were so rude.. We up and left and took our business somewhere else. So unhappy with this place

1.description: Today's spa.day party was a huge success because Ping and her staff rock. If you are looking for a clean,freindly,professional spa check this place out. Our private party was a huge success

0.description: One of my favorite nail spots. Friendly staff, great service. A hidden gem. This place gets busy. Bring cash for tip. Make an appointment with Moon or Ping.

3.description: We had a project that came into our shop that required us to handle some big wooden beams, and we didn't have the machinery to accommodate them.  I called Joseph to see if he could help and he picked up, surfaced the beams, and returned them... All within 24 hours.  And this is with less than a day's notice.  Very professional; We will be partnering with Pagoda again.

1.description: I recently had some major decorative woodworking done as a surround to my fireplace.  I interviewed 4 different contractors for this particular job, and ultimately chose to work with Joseph.  I could tell he had a true passion for what he did, and his knowledge of woodworking was top-notch.The communication process was easy throughout the entire process.  Joseph got the work done very quickly, even though I know he had a lot of other things going on at the same time.  whenever there was a question as to how I wanted to proceed, Joseph asked the right things to make sure the project turned out exactly as I wanted it.I would recommend Him to anyone.

2.description: My partner is an interior designer and found Pagoda Studios surfing online. He had a project for a client in Scottsdale, Az that happens to be a very good friend and a mentor of mine. Needless to say, I am always worried about ensuring they get the best for their homes. I asked Dave to write a review and have pasted it below. THE TABLE THEY MADE FOR THE CLIENT WAS TRULY AMAZING.Dave's review:I needed two custom made steel bases to hold up a 450 lb. table top for my clients dining room for their new house in Scottsdale. My client was moving from Chicago on Dec. 26th and I only had two weeks to come up with a solution and it was in the height of the Christmas holidays. I thought this would be an impossible.After checking out the Pagoda Studios website I decide to give them a call. Joseph helped me with my situation. I worked with him and told him what I wanted and he drew up plans and started on it immediately. He was able to deliver my client's bases on Dec. 23rd just before Christmas and in time for my clients move to Scottsdale.It was everything we had envisioned and I was really amazed at how great it looked. The service was so care free. I highly recommend Pagoda Studios to anyone who needs any repair or custom metal or wood work. David GoodmanL'ARTE DECORlartedecor.com

5.description: I found Joseph through a friend and asked him to repair and refinish a very beat-up mid-century modern Lane coffee table that my husband bought 10 years ago at a thrift shop. Joseph was so easy to work with and did a fantastic job on the table! One of the corners looked like a dog had taken a big bite out of it and after Joseph was done it looked like new! Joseph has great customer service. As we had a 2 wk old baby at home he worked around our schedule, came to my condo to pick up and then drop off the table. And it only took him about a week to do it. I would definitely use him again for my carpentry/furniture refinishing needs.

6.description: I found Joseph on Craigslist and I hired him to build some things for stage set. After he showed me some of his prior work I knew I had to hire him. The ideas and the things he had were great. I'm looking forward to working Joseph again in the future.

0.description: I loved working with Joseph from Pagoda Studio!!!I originally found him on Craigslist and hired him to put together a rather complex, ahem, Ikea shelving system. I use the system, which is comprised of floor-to-ceiling poles, clothing racks, and shelves, for my retail women's clothing boutique. I had previously put the shelving system together myself in a different location, but in my new space there was an unforeseen problem: the poles were not tall enough to reach the nearly 14 foot ceilings. After almost falling off of a ladder, I decided to find some help. Joseph responded quickly to my request, came over to assess the situation and figured out a solution to the not-long-enough-poles dilemma. He offered to construct some pine boxes to prop the poles on and affix them to so that they would then have the height needed to reach the ceiling! Brilliant! He made me a very reasonable quote for the project and finished the pine boxes in a very agreeable amount of time. Then he proceeded to complete the whole project, installing the boxes, and poles, and shelves, etc., in an afternoon. Also he is VERY good at design and knows what looks good and what will look bad. He assisted me in designing my space, i.e, where to put the poles, where to put the dressing room, etc. etc. He was extremely adept at customizing what we had to work with, supplementing extra pieces, and sawing down pieces to fit our custom design. Using every nook and cranny of our small space to it's best potential. Perfect!!About 8 months later, one of the poles came out of the ceiling in the studio section of my store, my fault for piling WAY too much weight on it. I called Joseph and he came over and fixed it right away, and also adjusted the other poles so as to be able to support more weight safely. Of course, when I decided I was MOVING my store - just one door over to a corner space with much better street exposure and triple the space-- I called Joseph right away with my new project.
